item.title: Amnesia as a Catalyst for Enhancing Black Box Pixel Attacks in Image Classification and Object Detection
item.description: RFPAR: A novel reinforcement learning-based attack enhances black-box pixel attacks by minimizing randomness and patch dependency, achieving state-of-the-art results in both image classification and o…
